mapper.insert: insert into education_background (background_id, resume_id, school_name, major, begin_time, end_time, education_describe) values (#{backgroundId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{educationDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update education_background set resume_id = #{resumeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school_name = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education_describe = #{educationDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where background_id = #{backgroundId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select background_id, resume_id, school_name, major, begin_time, end_time, education_describe from education_background
